mapper.select: select * from `group` where id = ${id} and state > 0 limit 1
select * from `group` where name = #{name} and paasId = #{paasId} and state > 0 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into `group` (name, remark, state, creatorId, createTime, paasId) values (#{name}, #{remark}, #{state}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{paasId})
insert into `group_users` (groupId, userId, state, creatorId, createTime, paasId) values (#{groupId}, #{userId}, #{state}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{paasId})
mapper.delete: delete from `group_users` where groupId = #{groupId} and userId = #{userId}
